ygData.subject: Re: HARMSHIELD what lvl?
ygData.msgSnippet: Regarding Harmshield: I ve seen this spell listed on level 20 spell lists several places but I have never seen it on a vendor.  Is it research only? Is it
ygData.messageBody:
Regarding Harmshield:

I've seen this spell listed on level 20 spell lists several places but I
have never seen it on a vendor. Is it research only? Is it better than
banshee aura or shieldskin?

Grymspine Mael'fesience
Level 20 Necromancer
Mithaniel Marr


>From: "Skel the Necromancer" <mata_eq@...>
>Reply-To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
>To: <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
>Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] HARMSHIELD what lvl?
>Date: Thu, 8 Jul 1999 11:50:18 -0400
>
>From: "Skel the Necromancer" <mata_eq@...>
>
>do you need a component to cast it? Cus I put it in my spell slot but it
>stays grey like I had just cast it! what is up w/ that?
>
>----- Original Message -----
>From: <TkAdam@...>
>To: <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
>Sent: Tuesday, July 06, 1999 3:42 PM
>Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] HARMSHIELD what lvl?
>

>after
>I
> > > cast this spell?
> >
> > Running away. It gives you 18 seconds to run :) No you cannot cast
>while
>it
> > is up.
> >
